titleStmt.title: SII 8.176: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 176. (A.R. No. 582 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
Aruḷicceyal . Uṭaiyār tirukkāṉapperuṭaiya nāyaṉār koyil patipālamulap paṭṭuṭaip pañcācāriyarkaḷukkum kaṇakkar tevakaṉmikaḷukkum cimāyeccuraṟkum Uṭaiyār tirukkāṉapperuṭaiya nāyaṉāṟku nām Eṟiyaruḷappaṇṇiṉa tirukkāmakkoṭṭattu Āḷuṭaiyanācciyāṟkum nām Eṟiyaruḷap
paṇṇiṉa tiruvitinācciyāṟkum Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi tirupparivaṭṭa muḷḷiṭṭa veñcaṉattukkum viṣu vayaṉa caṅkiṟamam tirukkāttikai tirupputiyū ruḷḷiṭṭa tivitaṅkaḷukkum nām kaṭṭiṉa nimantappaṭikkum Innācciyār koyil tiruppaṇikkum namakku kurutekkaṇaiyāka nāyaṉār vikkiramapāṇṭiyatevar tanta ti
ruvaraṅki velaṅkuḷamāṉa comaṉātanallūrkkum nāyaṉār virapāṇṭiyatevar tanta kārikuṭiyāṉa Āḷuṭaināyakanallūrkkum muṉṉāḷ tevatāṉamākak kal nāṭṭiṉapaṭikaḷile kārāṇmaiyāka kaikkoṇṭu Ivvūrkaḷil nāyaṉār cuntarapāṇṭiyatevaṟkum Aḻakiyacokkaṉārkkum Inta Āḷuṭaināyakanallūril ni
lam 2 10 5māvum comaṉātanallūr nilam 2 10 5māvum Āka patiṉaṟucāṇkol tivitappaṭi nilam 5 10māvuṅ kaṭaitalai Okka nilaṅ kalantapaṭi nikki nikki nāṉkellaik kuḷppaṭṭa nañcey puñceyum melnokkiṉa maramum kiḻnokkiṉa kiṇaṟum kuḷamum kuḷapparippum nattattil nāyaṉmār kuṭimakkaḷ Iruppu Iraṇṭu maṉaikkum nattamum
nikki nikkiuḷḷa nattamum nattappāḻum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa samattap prāttiyum nām kaṭṭiṉa nimantaṅkaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum nampiḷḷaikaḷ namakku tanta Irācacātaṉappaṭikaḷile nāyaṉār kulacekaratevaṟku 8vatu taimātammutal tantom nāyaṉār cuntarapāṇṭiyatevaṟkum Aḻakiyacokkaṉāṟkum nikkiṉa nilam Aṉpatumāvukku nācciyāṟku kaṭamaikoḷḷu
miṭattu Āṇṭoṉṟukku payirpārttu viḷaiñca nilattukku marakkāl civakkoḻuntāl māttāl nellu kalamāka vanta nellum Innilam Aṉpatumāvukkum tuṇṭippāṉa Accu Iraṇṭum Ivvaccum Innellum koḷḷumiṭattu viḷaiyāta Āṇṭukaḷukku tuṇṭippāṉa Accu Iraṇṭum koḷḷakkaṭavarkaḷākavum Ippaṭi kaṭamai koḷḷumiṭattu Accukkum Ivvilaippaṭi paṇamum Accu
Iraṇṭukkum koḷḷakkaṭavarkaḷḷākavum Ippaṭi cantirātittavaṟ celvatāka kallilum cempilum veṭṭikkoḷka . Ivai tavaccakkiṟavatti Eḻuttu . Ivai vayirātarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai Iyātavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 8.176 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
